comments.content: May you rest in peace darling

I was so looking forward to spending time with you, wandering the city, laughing, just existing. Please rest well, Ara. You are and always will be an angel 💜

Remember how we promised we were both gonna make it? I’m still carrying that promise with me. I will do my best for you.

Sleep well, and may you be finally at peace.
A smart girl...Your story impress me.

goodbye,friend

you will always have a special place in my heart, ara.
Words always have strength, there is no more worrying about the burden...May you rest in peace.
Although I don't know you, I wish you a happy little girl in your next life
I literally just found out about it but it already made me cry... rest in peace

thank you for everything ara. im sorry i couldnt be there to say goodbye, but i pray that you will be able to be at peace and comfort now. you were always there for me, showed kindness and attention when nobody else would. ill use what you taught me to take as good of care of others as i can. i will keep my promise. your passing will not be in vein.
